The Simple, Powerful, Open Source Tour Industry Software.
Outbound tour operation software.
Flexible Booking system that can handle any type of tour from groups to FITs
Tour Operation system powerful enough to handle those time-consuming tasks
Fully integrated accounting
Simplify the complicated job of tour operation.
Automate your Bookings, Operations, Accounting, and Marketing.
Make your entire tour operation accessible from the web.
Local setup is very simple. Just start up an OSGi container such as karaf and start the tourgeek bundles:
Download, unzip, and start apache-karaf.
In karaf, type:
karaf@root> shell:source mvn:org.jbundle.config/jbundle-artifacts//shell/setup
Point your broswer to http://localhost:8181.
Click on the travel system applet icon to try out the tourgeek system.
Note: By default, jbundle uses the derby database engine. The database will be located in your home directory at '.jbundle'.
Note: Be patient the first time you run tourgeek as there is a lot of automatic setup and configuration that needs to be done.
